translations: 发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声；把……揉成一团；使蜷缩，碾压；造发型

sentences.sentence: Her feet scrunch on the gravel.
sentences.translation: 她的脚喀嚓喀嚓地踩在沙砾上。

sentences.sentence: She scrunch it up and throw it in the bin.
sentences.translation: 她把它揉成一团，扔进了垃圾箱。

sentences.sentence: Do the "scrunch test" to see if clothes stay wrinkly.
sentences.translation: 看衣服是否容易褶皱，做“揉捏测试”
